content:
Calculation of EGriy

Since the project activity is “the installation of a new grid-connected renewable power plant at a site where no renewable power plant was operated prior to the implementation of the project activity”, it verifies the case of a Greenfield renewable energy power plant of the ACMO002 methodology Version 16.0 whereby:

EGpiy = EGracility,y

Where:

EGpiy = Quantity of net electricity generation that is produced and fed into the grid as a result of the implementation of the VCS project activity in year y (MWh/yr)

EGracility,y = Quantity of net electricity generation supplied by the project plant/unit to the grid in year y (MWh/yr)

EGpiy (or EGracilityy) is an ex-post parameter and EFgriacuy is an ex-ante parameter which are justified above.

26

Vv vcs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

The baseline emission calculation for the monitoring period is described in the table below:

EF gria,cm,y (tCOze/MWh) From 01/07/2022 to 31/12/2022 765,555 0.6042 462,548 From 01/01/2023 to 30/06/2023 744,251 0.6042 449,676 Total 1,509,806 : 912,224

The baseline emission (BEy) for the monitoring period is:

BEy = 912,224 tCO2
